headline.main: In G.E.'s Deal for Alstom, French Interventionism Wins Out

docs.snippet: After much posturing, the French government and G.E. are both declaring victory....
docs.abstract: After much posturing, the French government and G.E. are both declaring victory.

headline.print_headline: Iran Boosts Security Along Iraq Border Over ISIL Advance: IRNA
headline.main: Iran Boosts Security Along Iraq Border Over ISIL Advance: IRNA

docs.snippet: Iran has stepped up surveillance along its long border with Iraq in precaution against a spread of violence from militants who have siezed a swathe of its neighbor, a senior official said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran has stepped up surveillance along its long border with Iraq in precaution against a spread of violence from militants who have siezed a swathe of its neighbor, a senior official said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Argentina Economy Slips Into Recession in First-Quarter
headline.main: Argentina Economy Slips Into Recession in First-Quarter

docs.snippet: Argentina's economy slid into recession in the first quarter, piling fresh pressure on President Cristina Fernandez's leftist government to reach a deal with holdout creditors to avoid a new debt default....
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina's economy slid into recession in the first quarter, piling fresh pressure on President Cristina Fernandez's leftist government to reach a deal with holdout creditors to avoid a new debt default.

headline.print_headline: Dutch Defender Heitinga Joins Hertha Berlin
headline.main: Dutch Defender Heitinga Joins Hertha Berlin

docs.snippet: Hertha Berlin have signed Dutch centre-back John Heitinga on a free transfer from Fulham, the Bundesliga club said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hertha Berlin have signed Dutch centre-back John Heitinga on a free transfer from Fulham, the Bundesliga club said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: White House, Business Back Export-Import Bank
headline.main: White House, Business Back Export-Import Bank

docs.snippet: The White House and an influential pair of business organizations called for renewal of the Export-Import Bank on Monday, one day after newly elected House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy of California said the agency should be phased out....
docs.lead_paragraph: The White House and an influential pair of business organizations called for renewal of the Export-Import Bank on Monday, one day after newly elected House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy of California said the agency should be phased out.

headline.print_headline: Schumacher's Medical Files Might Have Been Stolen
headline.main: Schumacher's Medical Files Might Have Been Stolen

docs.snippet: Michael Schumacher's management has warned that someone is trying to sell documents that may be the medical files of the seven-time Formula One world champion....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Schumacher's management has warned that someone is trying to sell documents that may be the medical files of the seven-time Formula One world champion.

docs.snippet: The United States' 2-2 World Cup draw with Portugal is almost certainly the most-watched soccer game ever in the U.S., an emphatic confirmation of the sport's rising popularity in a country slower to embrace it than the rest of the world....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States' 2-2 World Cup draw with Portugal is almost certainly the most-watched soccer game ever in the U.S., an emphatic confirmation of the sport's rising popularity in a country slower to embrace it than the rest of the world.

headline.print_headline: A Guide to Daily Developments in Iraq
headline.main: A Guide to Daily Developments in Iraq

docs.snippet: The U.S. stepped up efforts to persuade Iraqi officials to stick to their official timetable of seating a new government soon in hopes that it can foster national reconciliation where previous efforts have failed in order to stem the rapidly expan...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. stepped up efforts to persuade Iraqi officials to stick to their official timetable of seating a new government soon in hopes that it can foster national reconciliation where previous efforts have failed in order to stem the rapidly expanding Sunni insurgency led by an al-Qaida breakaway group, the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant.

headline.print_headline: Holmes Lawyers Seek Officer's Disciplinary Records
headline.main: Holmes Lawyers Seek Officer's Disciplinary Records

docs.snippet: Defense attorneys in the Colorado theater shooting case want to see disciplinary records of a police officer who was working on the day of the attack, but the reason wasn't immediately clear....
docs.lead_paragraph: Defense attorneys in the Colorado theater shooting case want to see disciplinary records of a police officer who was working on the day of the attack, but the reason wasn't immediately clear.

headline.print_headline: US Gets Legal Protections for Forces in Iraq
headline.main: US Gets Legal Protections for Forces in Iraq

docs.snippet: The United States and Iraq have reached an agreement on legal protections for American commandos deploying into Iraq to assess and advise Iraqi forces, three years after efforts to reach a similar pact for a larger U.S. force failed....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States and Iraq have reached an agreement on legal protections for American commandos deploying into Iraq to assess and advise Iraqi forces, three years after efforts to reach a similar pact for a larger U.S. force failed.
